Source Block:
full_state[WIDTH-1:9] ^
                  full_state[WIDTH-1:4] ^
                  full_state[WIDTH-1:3] ^
                  data_in;

always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (reset == 1'b1) begin
    state <= 12'b0;
  end else begin
    state <= full_state[11:0] ^
            {full_state[10:0],1'b0} ^
            {full_state[9:0],2'b0} ^
            {full_state[8:0],3'b0} ^
            {full_state[3:0],8'b0} ^
            {full_state[2:0],9'b0};
  end
end

assign crc12 = state;

endmodule

    if (reset == 1'b1) begin
      state <= 12'b0;
    end else begin
